content:
System.Messaging.Design Namespace

Definition

The System.Messaging.Design namespace contains classes that can be used to extend design-time support for System.Messaging classes.

In this Article

Classes

MessageDesigner

Provides basic design-time functionality for the Message class.
QueuePathDialog

Represents a path editor control.
QueuePathEditor

Provides a user interface for selecting a message queue path.
